annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary repeal of §§ 1-615.01 through 1-615.03, see § 102(b) of the Whistleblower Reinforcement Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-400, July 13, 1998, 45 DCR 5158) and § 102(b) of the Whistleblower Reinforcement Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-464, October 28, 1998, 45 DCR 7821).
